triples.name: Boolean network
triples.relevance: The paper studies strong structural controllability of Boolean networks, which are discrete dynamical systems.

triples.name: Controllability
triples.relevance: The paper proposes new criteria for strong structural controllability of Boolean networks, extending controllability theory.

triples.name: Vertex cover
triples.relevance: The paper reduces the minimal strong structural controllability problem to the minimum vertex cover problem, which is NP-hard.

triples.name: Stochastic process
triples.relevance: The paper extends results to stochastic Boolean networks and their asymptotic stability.

triples.name: Stability theory
triples.relevance: The paper uses stability theory concepts to analyze asymptotic stability of stochastic Boolean networks.

triples.name: Control system
triples.relevance: The paper develops distributed pinning control strategies to achieve network controllability through feedback mechanisms.
